title: understanding
comment: God-given perception of the nature and meaning of things, resulting in sound judgment and decision-making; in particular the ability to discern spiritual truth and to apply it to human disposition and conduct.

seealsos.comment: God's understanding gives rise to compassion.

children.title: Understanding is a gift from God

secondaryrefs.comment: God's purpose in taking the righteous

cschildren.title: Lack of understanding of spiritual truth

children.title: Lack of understanding due to hardened hearts

secondaryrefs.comment: showing restraint and an even temper

cschildren.title: The results of a lack of understanding
